status.name: BREAK
status.text: BREAK was not in DO FOR SWITCH or WHILE

status.name: CASE
status.text: CASE was not in SWITCH statement

status.name: CONTINUE
status.text: CONTINUE was not in DO FOR or WHILE

status.name: EXTRANEOUS
status.text: Some characters were unused, bad number maybe

status.name: RETURN
status.text: Extraneous RETURN statement, not from a FUN

status.name: ABORT
status.text: Program requested abort

status.name: BAD_INDEX
status.text: Index or subscript is too small or too big

status.name: BOMB
status.text: Bad punctuation, could not compile the text

status.name: EXTRA_ARG
status.text: Too many arguments for function, watch commas

status.name: GOTO
status.text: GOTO target label not found

status.name: INVCLADSC
status.text: Storage class not valid, must be scalar or array

status.name: INVCLADTY
status.text: Invalid mixture of storage class and data type

status.name: INVDTYDSC
status.text: Storage data type is not valid

status.name: INV_OPC
status.text: Invalid operator code in a function

status.name: INV_SIZE
status.text: Number of elements does not match declaration

status.name: MISMATCH
status.text: Shape of arguments does not match

status.name: MISS_ARG
status.text: Missing argument is required for function

status.name: NDIM_OVER
status.text: Number of dimensions is over the allowed 8

status.name: NO_CMPLX
status.text: There are no complex forms of this function

status.name: NO_OPC
status.text: No support for this function, today

status.name: NO_OUTPTR
status.text: An output pointer is required

status.name: NO_SELF_PTR
status.text: No $VALUE is defined for signal or validation

status.name: NOT_NUMBER
status.text: Value is not a scalar number and must be

status.name: NULL_PTR
status.text: Null pointer where value needed

status.name: RECURSIVE
status.text: Overly recursive function, calls itself maybe

status.name: SIG_DIM
status.text: Signal dimension does not match data shape

status.name: SYNTAX
status.text: Bad punctuation or misspelled word or number

status.name: TOO_BIG
status.text: Conversion of number lost significant digits

status.name: UNBALANCE
status.text: Unbalanced () [] {} '' "" or /**/

status.name: UNKNOWN_VAR
status.text: Unknown/undefined variable name

status.name: STRTOOLON
status.text: string is too long (greater than 65535)

status.name: TIMEOUT
status.text: task did not complete in alotted time

status.name: APD_APPEND
status.text: First argument must be APD or *

status.name: DICT_KEYVALPAIR
status.text: A Dictionary requires an even number of elements

status.name: DICT_KEYCLS
status.text: Keys must be scalar, i.e. CLASS_S
